what does it mean when "the applicaiton is in refresh mode"

when a file change is detected, it goes to refresh mode ("refreshing 
resources") to update the local copy.

unable to reproduce.  Closing for now.  Please reopen if there is additional 
information.

The problem still exists but it is difficult to specify what exactly causes the 
crash.
Today after the first crash, subsequesant start caused the work environment to 
reset and while it was refreshing resources, it crashed again. It is not 
starting again.

Attached is the log file containing stack trace.

There are lots of unhandled NULL pointer exceptions in the st. Crashes like 
these brings are certainly reducing its usability as java IDE.
Could you please indicate which version of eclipse you are using?

Please try with M7 or even better with one of the latest I build.
So many things changed since then that this is probably gone already.
Closing as fixed.  Please reopen if you see the problem again in a current build
